tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE underwriting_guidelines (
    guideline_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    max_loan_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    min_credit_score INTEGER NOT NULL,
    debt_to_income_ratio DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE UnderwritingGuidelines (
  guideline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guideline_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  min_age INT,
  max_age INT,
  min_income DECIMAL,
  max_income DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE RiskAssessment (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guideline_id INT,
  risk_score INT,
  risk_category VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (guideline_id) REFERENCES UnderwritingGuidelines(guideline_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PolicyPricing (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guideline_id INT,
  base_price DECIMAL,
  discount_rate DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (guideline_id) REFERENCES UnderwritingGuidelines(guideline_id)
);

CREATE TABLE underwriting_guidelines (
	id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	age_range JSONB,
	income_range JSONB,
	credit_score_range JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE UnderwritingGuidelines (
  guideline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guideline_description VARCHAR(255),
  min_age INT,
  max_age INT,
  min_income DECIMAL(10,2),
  max_income DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE RiskAssessment (
  risk_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  guideline_id INT,
  risk_category VARCHAR(50),
  risk_score INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (guideline_id) REFERENCES UnderwritingGuidelines(guideline_id)
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyPricing (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  risk_id INT,
  base_premium DECIMAL(10,2),
  final_premium DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (risk_id) REFERENCES RiskAssessment(risk_id)
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerInfo (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(100),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyHistory (
  policy_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  PRIMARY KEY (policy_id, customer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES PolicyPricing(policy_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerInfo(customer_id)
)
